plot outline: while on his trip to Goa Neil comes across Ananya and both get into argument.Neil feels guilty about his argument and when he comes again across Ananya he tells her to forgive him.Ananya requests him that she will forgive him on one condition if he finds a book she wants.Neil with the help of Gabby finds the book.After giving the book to Ananya ,Neil travels back to Pune where he cant take Ananya out his mind and travels back to Goa to share his feelings with her.
title: Baavare Prem He
plot: A chance encounter in Goa has a young man convinced that he's met his soulmate.
